member.name: T:JellyPro.Api.DashboardController
member.summary: API controller for the JellyPro dashboard.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Api.DashboardController.#ctor(JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore,MediaBrowser.Controller.Session.ISessionManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Api.DashboardController.GetClients
member.summary: Gets all known clients with their capabilities and confidence scores.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Api.DashboardController.GetTelemetry(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets recent playback telemetry outcomes.
member.param: Number of hours to look back (default 24).

member.name: M:JellyPro.Api.DashboardController.GetInterventions(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets recent intervention records showing when JellyPro influenced playback decisions.
member.param: Number of hours to look back (default 24).

member.name: M:JellyPro.Api.DashboardController.GetSummary
member.summary: Gets a summary of the plugin state.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration
member.summary: Plugin configuration — exposed via Jellyfin dashboard.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.EnableDynamicProfiles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether dynamic profile shaping is enabled. When false, the plugin only observes (telemetry mode).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.EnableLearning
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the learning/adaptation layer is active.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.ConservativeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether conservative mode is active. Conservative mode defers to Jellyfin defaults on any uncertain decision.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.ServerLoadBiasWeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the weight applied to server load when biasing decisions. Range: 0.0 (ignore load) to 1.0 (heavily weight load).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.GlobalMaxBitrateOverride
member.summary: Gets or sets the global max bitrate override in bits/sec. Null means defer to Jellyfin/client defaults.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.EnableVerboseLogging
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether verbose telemetry logging is enabled.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration.TelemetryRetentionDays
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days to retain telemetry data before pruning.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.DecisionEngineService
member.summary: Core decision engine — computes playback policy from client + media models. Deterministic, stateless, and independently testable.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Decision.DecisionEngineService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Decision.DecisionEngineService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used by Jellyfin DI — pulls config from the live plugin instance.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Decision.DecisionEngineService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Decision.DecisionEngineService},System.Func{JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration},System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{JellyPro.Decision.Rules.IPlaybackRule})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used by tests — accepts explicit config and rules for deterministic behavior.
member.param: Function that supplies the current configuration.
Static rules to evaluate. Pass null for defaults.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.IDecisionEngineService
member.summary: Computes playback policy recommendations from client + media intelligence. Returns advisory recommendations, not commands.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Decision.IDecisionEngineService.ComputePolicy(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel,JellyPro.Models.MediaModel)
member.summary: Computes the optimal playback policy for a given client and media combination.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.AudioPassthroughRule
member.summary: Detects audio codecs that require transcoding on specific client types. Lossless audio (TrueHD, DTS-HD MA) can't be decoded by most clients natively and require either passthrough to a receiver or audio transcoding.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.BitDepthCompatibilityRule
member.summary: Detects bit depth incompatibilities. H.264 Hi10P (10-bit H.264) is almost universally unsupported in hardware. 12-bit content has very limited client support.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.BitrateCapRule
member.summary: Applies bitrate caps for clients known to have bandwidth constraints. Mobile clients on cellular, Roku over WiFi, and DLNA renderers often cannot handle high bitrate streams.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.ContainerCodecCompatibilityRule
member.summary: Encodes known container+codec incompatibilities per client type. These are hard facts — ignoring them causes playback failure.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.HdrCompatibilityRule
member.summary: Detects HDR/Dolby Vision content that will require tone-mapping on clients that don't support HDR output. Tone-mapping is CPU-expensive and should be flagged clearly in policy decisions.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.IPlaybackRule
member.summary: A static playback rule that encodes a known compatibility fact. Rules are deterministic — same inputs always produce the same output. Return null if the rule doesn't apply to this client+media combination.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.IPlaybackRule.Name
member.summary: Gets the unique name of this rule for logging and telemetry.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.IPlaybackRule.Evaluate(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel,JellyPro.Models.MediaModel)
member.summary: Evaluates whether this rule applies to the given client and media.
member.returns: A rule result if the rule applies, or null if it doesn't.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult
member.summary: The outcome of a static rule evaluation. Null return from a rule means it doesn't apply.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.RuleName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the rule that produced this result.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.AllowDirectPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets whether direct play should be allowed. Null means the rule has no opinion on this dimension.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.AllowDirectStream
member.summary: Gets or sets whether direct stream (remux) should be allowed. Null means the rule has no opinion.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.AllowTranscoding
member.summary: Gets or sets whether transcoding should be allowed. Null means the rule has no opinion.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.BitrateCap
member.summary: Gets or sets a recommended bitrate cap in bits/sec. Null means no cap recommendation.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.Reasoning
member.summary: Gets or sets the human-readable reasoning for this rule's decision.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleResult.Severity
member.summary: Gets or sets the severity of this rule's recommendation. Higher severity rules override lower ones on conflicting dimensions.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleSeverity
member.summary: How strongly the rule feels about its recommendation.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleSeverity.Suggest
member.summary: Soft suggestion — can be overridden by other signals.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleSeverity.Recommend
member.summary: Strong recommendation — should be followed unless contradicted by higher severity.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Decision.Rules.RuleSeverity.Require
member.summary: Hard constraint — known incompatibility, ignoring will cause playback failure.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Intelligence.ClientIntelligenceService
member.summary: Resolves client identity through a pipeline of heuristics. Never blindly trusts client claims — builds confidence over time.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.ClientIntelligenceService.#ctor(JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Intelligence.ClientIntelligenceService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.ClientIntelligenceService.ApplyDefaultConfidence(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel)
member.summary: Applies baseline codec and container confidence based on known client type capabilities. Only sets defaults for entries not already in the map (preserves learned values).

member.name: T:JellyPro.Intelligence.IClientIntelligenceService
member.summary: Resolves and maintains normalized client models from Jellyfin session data.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.IClientIntelligenceService.ResolveClient(MediaBrowser.Controller.Session.SessionInfo)
member.summary: Resolves a from a Jellyfin session. Uses a resolver pipeline: UserAgent → DeviceProfile → HistoricalBehavior. Results are cached per device.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.IClientIntelligenceService.GetCachedClient(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a cached client model by device identifier without re-resolving.
member.returns: The cached client model, or null if not found.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.IClientIntelligenceService.InvalidateCache(System.String)
member.summary: Invalidates the cached client model for a device.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Intelligence.IMediaIntelligenceService
member.summary: Analyzes media sources and produces normalized media models with transcode cost estimates.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.IMediaIntelligenceService.ResolveMedia(MediaBrowser.Model.Dto.MediaSourceInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Resolves a from a Jellyfin media source. Results are cached per media source ID.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.IMediaIntelligenceService.GetCachedMedia(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a cached media model by media source identifier.
member.returns: The cached media model, or null if not found.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.IMediaIntelligenceService.InvalidateAllCache
member.summary: Invalidates all cached media models (e.g. after library scan).

member.name: T:JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService
member.summary: Analyzes media characteristics and estimates transcode cost. Does NOT perform expensive media probing — uses Jellyfin's existing metadata.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService.EstimateTranscodeCost(JellyPro.Models.MediaModel)
member.summary: Heuristic transcode cost estimation covering the full codec/container spectrum. This is trade-off math, not dogma. Scores accumulate — multiple cost factors compound.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService.ClassifyVideoCodecWeight(System.String)
member.summary: Assigns a base weight to the video codec based on decode complexity.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService.ClassifyAudioTranscodeWeight(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Evaluates whether audio alone would force a transcode and how expensive it would be. High channel counts with complex codecs are more expensive.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Intelligence.MediaIntelligenceService.EvaluateRemuxPotential(JellyPro.Models.MediaModel)
member.summary: For media that scores 0 on codec complexity, check if a container remux is likely needed.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Learning.ILearningService
member.summary: Learns from playback outcomes to adjust client confidence scores over time. The feedback loop: PlaybackOutcome → ConfidenceAdjustment → ClientModel update.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Learning.ILearningService.ProcessOutcome(JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome,JellyPro.Models.ClientModel)
member.summary: Processes a completed playback outcome and adjusts the client's codec/container confidence scores accordingly.
member.param: The client model to adjust. Modified in place.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Learning.ILearningService.RecalibrateClient(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel)
member.summary: Recalculates confidence scores for a client from its full outcome history. Use this for bulk recalibration rather than incremental updates.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Learning.LearningService
member.summary: Adjusts client confidence scores based on observed playback outcomes. Uses exponential moving average — recent outcomes weigh more than old ones. All adjustments are bounded to prevent runaway confidence drift.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Learning.LearningService.#ctor(JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Learning.LearningService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used by Jellyfin DI.
member.param: Persistent data store for outcome history.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Learning.LearningService.#ctor(JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Learning.LearningService},System.Func{JellyPro.Configuration.PluginConfiguration})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Used by tests — accepts explicit config provider.
member.param: Persistent data store for outcome history.
Function that supplies the current configuration.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Learning.LearningService.ClassifyOutcome(JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome)
member.summary: Classifies an outcome's result if it hasn't been classified yet. Uses playback ratio and play method to determine success/failure.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel
member.summary: Normalized representation of a client device's capabilities and reliability. Decoupled from Jellyfin types for loose coupling and upgrade survival.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.DeviceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique device identifier (from Jellyfin session).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.ClientType
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolved client type.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.ClientName
member.summary: Gets or sets the client application name (e.g. "Jellyfin Web", "Jellyfin for Roku").

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.ClientVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the client application version string.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the device name as reported by the client.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.UserAgent
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw user agent string.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.CodecConfidence
member.summary: Gets or sets codec support confidence scores. Key: lowercase codec name (e.g. "hevc", "h264", "av1"). Value: confidence 0.0 (no support) to 1.0 (confirmed support).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.ContainerConfidence
member.summary: Gets or sets container support confidence scores. Key: lowercase container name (e.g. "mkv", "mp4", "ts"). Value: confidence 0.0 (no support) to 1.0 (confirmed support).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.MaxBitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum bitrate the client can reliably handle (bits/sec). Null means unknown / unconstrained.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.ReliabilityScore
member.summary: Gets or sets the overall reliability score for this client. Range: 0.0 (unreliable) to 1.0 (rock solid).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.FirstSeen
member.summary: Gets or sets when this model was first created.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.ClientModel.LastUpdated
member.summary: Gets or sets when this model was last updated.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.ClientType
member.summary: Known client platform categories.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.Unknown
member.summary: Unidentified client.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.WebBrowser
member.summary: Web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge).

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.AndroidTv
member.summary: Android TV official client or Findroid.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.AndroidMobile
member.summary: Android mobile client.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.Roku
member.summary: Roku channel.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.FireTv
member.summary: Amazon Fire TV (Android TV variant).

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.SwiftfinIos
member.summary: Swiftfin on iOS.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.SwiftfinTvos
member.summary: Swiftfin on tvOS / Apple TV.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.Desktop
member.summary: Jellyfin Desktop (formerly Jellyfin Media Player).

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.Xbox
member.summary: Xbox app.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.Kodi
member.summary: Kodi with Jellyfin plugin.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.ClientType.Dlna
member.summary: DLNA renderer.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord
member.summary: Records a policy intervention — when JellyPro influenced (or would have influenced) a playback decision for a client/media combination.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this record.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the UTC timestamp of the intervention.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.DeviceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the device identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.DeviceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the client/device display name.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.ClientName
member.summary: Gets or sets the client application name.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.MediaSourceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the media source identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a profile was actively applied or just a dry run.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.AllowDirectPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets whether direct play was allowed by the policy.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.AllowDirectStream
member.summary: Gets or sets whether direct stream was allowed by the policy.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.AllowTranscoding
member.summary: Gets or sets whether transcoding was allowed by the policy.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.BitrateCap
member.summary: Gets or sets the bitrate cap applied, if any.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.Confidence
member.summary: Gets or sets the confidence level of the policy decision (0.0–1.0).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord.Reasoning
member.summary: Gets or sets the human-readable reasoning for the decision.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel
member.summary: Normalized representation of a media source's characteristics. Decoupled from Jellyfin types for loose coupling.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.MediaSourceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Jellyfin media source identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.ItemId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Jellyfin item identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.VideoCodec
member.summary: Gets or sets the video codec (e.g. "hevc", "h264", "av1").

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.AudioCodec
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary audio codec (e.g. "aac", "ac3", "truehd").

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.Container
member.summary: Gets or sets the container format (e.g. "mkv", "mp4", "ts").

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.Bitrate
member.summary: Gets or sets the total bitrate in bits/sec.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the video width in pixels.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the video height in pixels.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.VideoBitDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the video bit depth (8, 10, 12).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.VideoProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets the video profile (e.g. "Main", "Main 10", "High").

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.VideoRangeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the video range type (e.g. "SDR", "HDR10", "HLG", "DolbyVision").

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.AudioChannels
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of audio channels.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.HasImageSubtitles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the media has image-based subtitles (PGS, VobSub).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.HasTextSubtitles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the media has text-based subtitles (SRT, ASS).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.MediaModel.TranscodeCostEstimate
member.summary: Gets or sets the estimated transcoding cost for this media item.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost
member.summary: Heuristic estimate of how expensive transcoding this media would be.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost.Unknown
member.summary: Not yet estimated.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost.Remux
member.summary: Container remux only — negligible CPU.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost.Low
member.summary: Audio transcode only — low CPU.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost.Medium
member.summary: Standard video transcode (1080p H.264).

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost.High
member.summary: Heavy transcode (4K, HDR tone-mapping, burn-in subs).

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.TranscodeCost.Extreme
member.summary: Extreme transcode (4K HEVC HDR → H.264 SDR with burn-in subs).

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome
member.summary: Records the outcome of a playback session for telemetry and learning.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the LiteDB document identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.DeviceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the device identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.ClientName
member.summary: Gets or sets the client application name.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.ItemId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Jellyfin item identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.PlaySessionId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Jellyfin play session identifier.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.VideoCodec
member.summary: Gets or sets the video codec of the media source.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.AudioCodec
member.summary: Gets or sets the audio codec of the media source.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.Container
member.summary: Gets or sets the container format.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.PlayMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the play method observed (DirectPlay, DirectStream, Transcode).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.TranscodeReasons
member.summary: Gets or sets the transcode reasons if transcoding occurred. Comma-separated flags from Jellyfin's TranscodeReason enum.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets the result of the playback session.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.PlayedTicks
member.summary: Gets or sets the playback duration in ticks before the session ended.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.TotalTicks
member.summary: Gets or sets the total media runtime in ticks.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.PolicySnapshot
member.summary: Gets or sets the policy that was active during this session (serialized).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets when this playback session started.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackResult
member.summary: Observed result of a playback session.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackResult.Unknown
member.summary: Outcome not yet determined.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackResult.Success
member.summary: Playback completed or user stopped normally.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackResult.Failure
member.summary: Playback failed or errored.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackResult.SuspectedFailure
member.summary: Session was very short relative to media length — possible failure or buffering.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackResult.Transcoded
member.summary: Transcoding was triggered (not necessarily a failure, but noteworthy).

member.name: T:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy
member.summary: The decision engine's recommendation for a given client + media combination. These are advisory — they bias Jellyfin's native logic, not override it.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.AllowDirectPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether direct play should be allowed/favored.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.AllowDirectStream
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether direct stream (remux) should be allowed.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.AllowTranscoding
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether transcoding should be allowed as fallback.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.BitrateCap
member.summary: Gets or sets the recommended max bitrate cap in bits/sec. Null means no override.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.PreferredVideoCodec
member.summary: Gets or sets the preferred video codec bias (e.g. prefer "h264" over "hevc" for this client). Empty means no bias.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.Confidence
member.summary: Gets or sets the confidence level of this policy decision. Range: 0.0 (pure guess) to 1.0 (high confidence).

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.Reasoning
member.summary: Gets or sets the human-readable reasoning for this decision. Used for telemetry and debugging.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.IsDefault
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this policy is a default pass-through that requires no profile shaping.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy.Default
member.summary: Creates a default pass-through policy that defers entirely to Jellyfin.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Plugin
member.summary: JellyPro — Adaptive playback policy engine for Jellyfin.

member.name: F:JellyPro.Plugin.PluginId
member.summary: Plugin unique identifier.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Plugin.#ctor(MediaBrowser.Common.Configuration.IApplicationPaths,MediaBrowser.Model.Serialization.IXmlSerializer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:JellyPro.Plugin.Instance
member.summary: Gets the current plugin instance.

member.name: T:JellyPro.PluginServiceRegistrator
member.summary: Registers all JellyPro services into the Jellyfin DI container.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Profiles.IProfileManagerService
member.summary: Manages dynamic device profile adjustments. This is the primary lever for safely influencing Jellyfin's playback decisions. Profiles = persuasion, not coercion.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Profiles.IProfileManagerService.ApplyPolicy(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel,JellyPro.Models.MediaModel,JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy)
member.summary: Applies a playback policy by building and persisting a shaped DeviceProfile. When EnableDynamicProfiles is off, logs the intended action as a dry run.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Profiles.IProfileManagerService.GetAppliedProfile(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the most recently applied shaped profile for a device.
member.returns: The shaped profile, or null if none has been applied.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Profiles.IProfileManagerService.ClearAppliedProfile(System.String)
member.summary: Clears the applied profile for a device, reverting to Jellyfin defaults.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Profiles.ProfileBuilder
member.summary: Pure function: builds a shaped from a and . No side effects, fully testable.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Profiles.ProfileBuilder.Build(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel,JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy)
member.summary: Builds a that encodes the policy decisions into Jellyfin's native profile format.
member.returns: A shaped device profile, or null if the policy is default/no-op.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Profiles.ProfileManagerService
member.summary: Phase 3 implementation: builds shaped DeviceProfiles from policy decisions and persists them via IDeviceManager so Jellyfin's native playback resolution respects our intelligence.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Profiles.ProfileManagerService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Profiles.ProfileManagerService},MediaBrowser.Controller.Devices.IDeviceManager,JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore,MediaBrowser.Controller.Session.ISessionManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Jellyfin device manager for persisting capabilities.
Plugin data store for recording interventions.
Session manager for sending client notifications.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore
member.summary: Persistent storage abstraction for plugin data. Backed by LiteDB in the default implementation.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.GetClientModel(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a stored client model by device identifier.
member.returns: The client model, or null if not found.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.UpsertClientModel(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel)
member.summary: Persists or updates a client model.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.GetAllClientModels
member.summary: Retrieves all stored client models.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.RecordOutcome(JellyPro.Models.PlaybackOutcome)
member.summary: Records a playback outcome for telemetry.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.GetOutcomesByDevice(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves playback outcomes for a specific device.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.GetOutcomesSince(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves all playback outcomes within a time range.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.PruneOutcomes(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Deletes playback outcomes older than the specified date.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.RecordIntervention(JellyPro.Models.InterventionRecord)
member.summary: Records a policy intervention event.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore.GetInterventionsSince(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves intervention records within a time range.
member.returns: Interventions since the specified time, newest first.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Storage.LiteDbDataStore
member.summary: LiteDB-backed persistent storage for plugin data. Stored in the plugin's configuration directory — never alongside media.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Storage.LiteDbDataStore.#ctor(MediaBrowser.Common.Configuration.IApplicationPaths,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Storage.LiteDbDataStore})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Jellyfin application paths for locating the plugin data directory.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Telemetry.ITelemetryService
member.summary: Records playback decisions, outcomes, and events for analysis and learning.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Telemetry.ITelemetryService.RecordPlaybackStart(JellyPro.Models.ClientModel,JellyPro.Models.MediaModel,JellyPro.Models.PlaybackPolicy,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Records a playback start event with the decision that was made.
member.param: The actual play method Jellyfin selected.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Telemetry.ITelemetryService.RecordPlaybackStop(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Nullable{System.Int64})
member.summary: Records a playback stop event with duration information.
member.returns: The classified outcome, or null if no matching start record was found.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Telemetry.ITelemetryService.PruneOldData
member.summary: Prunes old telemetry data based on configured retention period.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Telemetry.PlaybackEventHandler
member.summary: Hosted service that subscribes to Jellyfin session lifecycle events. This is the main entry point for the entire plugin pipeline: Session event → Resolve client/media → Compute policy → Apply/Log → Record telemetry.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:JellyPro.Telemetry.TelemetryService
member.summary: Records playback events and outcomes to persistent storage. Feeds the learning layer and provides ground truth for optimization tuning.

member.name: M:JellyPro.Telemetry.TelemetryService.#ctor(JellyPro.Storage.IPluginDataStore,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{JellyPro.Telemetry.TelemetryService})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
